name: Team Activity Profiles & Recent Output
description: Added clickable agent cards that expand inline profile panels with GitHub-style daily activity grids and project contribution lists, plus a Recent Output section showing the last 3 completed projects.

tasks.title: Planned and implemented activity profiles feature (CEO direct)
subtasks: Added data-agent attributes and tabindex/role/aria-expanded to all 17 roster list items in index.html
Added 19 --color-agent-*-rgb tokens to tokens.css for rgba() opacity-based activity grids
Created js/roster.js — IIFE fetching data/tasks.json, building per-agent activity index
Implemented GitHub-style daily activity grid (7-row CSS grid, columns per week, month labels)
Built inline profile panel with grid-template-rows expand/collapse animation
Rendered project contribution list per agent with role, subtask count, and file count
Built Recent Output section showing last 3 completed projects with agent count, files, and decisions
Added delegated click handler and keyboard support (Enter/Space) on roster grid
Added responsive styles and reduced-motion support for profile panels
Added recent-output container div and roster.js script tag to index.html
decisions: Daily grid over monthly grid — CEO directed, matches GitHub contribution graph pattern
Month-level data spread across all days in active months — honest representation given data granularity
Profile panel inserted after last item in visual grid row for full-width span
Horizontal scroll on activity grid for narrow screens rather than truncating
